review_5: Better than I expected. Looks and works well. Can get several hours of play out of it. Multiplayer areas are nice but not heavily populated. Most people don‚Äôt mind if you join in and fish quietly. Only have had one person get a little obnoxious when people weren‚Äôt responding to their voice chat. You are rewarded with rarer fish for leveling up your equipment, which you can earn by fishing more. Really shocked the developers provided this game for free. Give it a try.
